charges.charge_description: 21:846 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE AND POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE MARIJUANA; 18:924(d), 21:853, 28:2461(c) FORFEITURE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: IMPRISONMENT for a total term of 30 months, concurrent on counts one and three; SUPERVISED RELEASE for a term of 3 years, concurrent on counts one and three; ASSESSMENT $200.00; FINE $10,000.00
